Name: Spirits Chronicles: Flower Of Hope Collector's Edition
About the game: Animals inhabiting Lorelai keep coming down with some kind of unknown disease! The townspeople are terrified: heretofore calm and obedient familiars attack their owners! Only the one who knows animals best can figure something out. You come to the town to get to the root of the problem and help poor animals, but learn that the disease is just the tip of the iceberg. Who is behind this horrible deed? Why does the villain choose animals to suffer? There are so many questions, and so few answers. Solve puzzles, tame aggressive animals, deal with knotty problems, and learn the truth. Gather your wits for an unforgettable detective story in this pulse-pounded new Hidden-Object Puzzle Adventure! This Collector's Edition includes: Use your trustworthy bestiary to tame vicious creatures. Explore extra locations to make lots of fascinating discoveries. Solve more than 25 intriguing puzzles. The Fiery Flower is gone â€“ fires are wreaking havoc in the village. Track down the thief and bring the flower back in the Bonus Chapter!
